markdownRemark.html:
Figured I’d throw a quick site together to host project demos. This site is powered by Gatsby and is based on a modified mashup of gatsby-starter-resume and gatsby-starter-blog with some (ongoing) improvements in usability and code quality.

This site is strictly utilitarian; I’m a web developer in my daily job but my hobbyist projects tend to be more CLI/framework oriented. As a result, this site isn’t meant to be a showcase of my webdev skills so please keep that in mind if you’re browsing this site’s source code.
